name.ja: ハイブリッドライブ・バンパー

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 4 Dragon Type and/or Machine Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: The attacking monster loses 1600 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you returned 2 different Types to meet the requirement, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 9 or lower monster on your opponent's field.
